bio: Idealist and idea generator, non-profit founder, hockey idealist, tea connoisseur, gadget guru, traveler, and a nerd in my own right. University at Buffalo, SUNY Marketing & Communication St. Joseph's College Marketing The Hockey Foundation Executive Director & Founder Eastern Mountain Sports Department Manager, Gadget Guru Starbucks Supervisor New York Islanders Amateur Hockey Development Coordinator, Marketing Assistant, Special Projects Coordinator Harney and Sons Tea Consultant
